author: daxian-dbw
body:
A couple issues were noticed after https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/14414 was merged. Open this issue to track them.

1. Progress message truncation when `MaxWidth` is not big enough. See https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/14414#issuecomment-774223880
2. New progress rendering fails when `MaxWidth` is too small to have enough space for the `[...]` part. See https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/14414#issuecomment-774225695

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: On Windows systems that don't support VT, should fallback to legacy rendering

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I believe both of these have been addressed

title: A couple issues in the new progress bar
